section.title: Verify the Block Storage installation
section.para: To verify that the Block Storage is installed and configured properly, create a new volume.
For more information about how to manage volumes, see the OpenStack User Guide.

step.para: Use the cinder create command to create a new volume:

step.para: Make sure that the volume has been correctly created with the cinder list command:
If the status value is not available, the volume creation failed. Check the log files in the /var/log/cinder/ directory on the controller and volume nodes to get information about the failure.
